description: Sum of the divisors of n^n (A000312).
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,100
prog: (PARI) for(n=0,22,print(sigma(n^n)))(PARI) { for (n=0, 100, write("b062727.txt", n, " ", sigma(n^n)) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 09 2009
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jul 11 2001
